wikipedia_page.main: Cecil Quentin (1852 – 29 October 1926) was a sailor from Great Britain, who represented his native country at the 1900 Summer Olympics in Le Havre, France. Quentin took the gold in the 20+ ton.He was educated at Cheltenham College.
